sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Upload a jpg, png, gif, webp, or svg image.

sub_fields.label: Video
sub_fields.name: video
sub_fields.instructions: Embed a Vimeo or YouTube video using the respective embed URL (ie. https://player.vimeo.com/video/VIDEO_ID or https://youtube.com/embed/VIDEO_ID)

sub_fields.label: Custom Title
sub_fields.name: custom_title
sub_fields.instructions: Use an optional custom title for the tab. If nothing is entered here, the coding language is used as the tab title.

sub_fields.label: Heading
sub_fields.name: heading
sub_fields.instructions: This gets used as the title in the dropdown selector as well as the heading on the section content.

sub_fields.label: Custom Title
sub_fields.name: custom_title
sub_fields.instructions: Use an optional custom title for the tab. If nothing is entered here, the coding language is used as the tab title.

sub_fields.label: Tile Image
sub_fields.name: tile_image
sub_fields.instructions: Add an optional image to this tile.

sub_fields.label: API Reference URL
sub_fields.name: api_reference_url
sub_fields.instructions: Add the URL to the API reference YML file.
